It's a great fit for your preferences, with a clever and intriguing premise that explores the secrets we keep from our loved ones. The all-star cast, including Rebecca Gibney and Philip Quast, brings depth to this emotional rollercoaster.

If you're looking for something a bit more unconventional, I'd recommend "The Number 23" (2007). This mind-bending thriller follows Walter Sparrow as he becomes obsessed with a novel that seems to be predicting his life. With a talented cast including Jim Carrey and Virginia Madsen, this movie is sure to keep you guessing until the very end!
